Addresses.description: Indicates addresses belonging to a subscriber, used to create, retrieve, update or delete an email or SMS Address for a given subscriber.

EmailAddress.description: Contains the email address for a subscriber. Indicates the data extension field contains email address data.

EmailTypePreference.description: The format in which email should be sent

ListIDs.description: Defines list IDs a subscriber resides on.

Locale.description: Contains the locale information for an Account. If no location is set, Locale defaults to en-US (English in United States).

PartnerKey.description: Unique identifier provided by partner for an object, accessible only via API.

PartnerType.description: Defines partner associated with a subscriber.

PrimaryEmailAddress.description: Indicates primary email address for a subscriber.

PrimarySMSAddress.description: Indicates primary SMS address for a subscriber. Used to create and update SMS Address for a given subscriber.

Status.description: Defines status of object. Status of an address.

SubscriberTypeDefinition.description: Specifies if a subscriber resides in an integration, such as Salesforce or Microsoft Dynamics CRM

UnsubscribedDate.description: Represents date subscriber unsubscribed from a list.
